description: This file defines a React-like component called NotesSidebar, which renders a sidebar UI with branding, a button to create new notes, search input, and tag filters. It manages interactions like toggling tags and handling search input, with props for external state control.

methods.name: onSubmitSearch$
methods.description: Synthetic event handler for the search form submission, preventing default form submission behavior.

methods.name: toggleTag$
methods.description: Method to toggle the presence of a tag in the selected tags list.
